phrases: We hereby appoint you to be Mom for Plant Four?
There was a sudden opening at Plant Four for a Mom.
I have been recommending you for some time, which is why you were selected.
Grandma is at the gate to pick you up.
Pack up immediately and go back to headquarters.
Please do your best at the new plant, too.
Oh no, this is an honor.
She intends to get rid of me!
It is all or nothing, but I have to try.
I will not let everything go her way!
She has some work to do.
There is something I would like to report.
Mom said she has work to do.
So, is this what you mean?
In addition to the facts on this note,
the other perfect scorers know about the secret and are trying to escape.
And the two high-quality ones below them!
I do not have evidence regarding their escape, but please believe me!
If we leave this alone, it will get dangerous!
they are being kept under control, right?
If they are kept under control, then there are no issues.
Just like how it was back in my day.
This is troublesome, Sister Krone, that you get in Isabella's way.
Isabella is a necessary pawn for me.
You are insufficient to take her place.
It will become troublesome for me.
May we offer the best plate at the Tifari.
May the farm have maximum profits.
I had no chance of winning from the beginning.
You are good at playing tag, right?
Then destroy this damned world we live in!
Let us start switching out the chemicals.
Let us go over the plan.
Norman and Emma will climb the wall to inspect the vicinity.
Don and Gilda, stay outside where you can see the south window on the House's second floor.
Just in case I fail to distract Mom, I will signal you.
Let Emma and Norman know to cancel the inspection immediately.
I did not need her anymore.
That is why I eliminated her.
Our deal is over, right here and now.
You need me, do not you?
Do not you want to use me so you can control them
indirectly and peacefully from behind the scenes?
I was doing a good job.
Yes, you were a useful dog.
That is why I kept you by my side.
Even if you are a lying traitor.
Even so, there should not be a problem, right?
As long as I am useful!
It is true that there is no fault with you.
It is also unfortunate for me.
I did not want to let you go until the end.
From now on, I will control them by myself.
Please forgive me for the things I am about to do.
Stay there for a bit, okay?
I will let you out when I come back.
From the speed of the two signals running through the forest,
it must be Emma and Norman.
They are heading straight for the fence.
I wonder if it is for inspection?
Oh, and I do not care about the chemicals.
That is because you will protect me.
For their sake, you will not get me killed.
That is why if you wanted to suppress me, you will definitely use a different method.
Thank you for all your hard work until now.
In any case, I have to get out of here!
Ray has not signaled us, but Mom came out!
I will check inside the House!
Are we stopping Emma and Norman?
This is now our only chance!
We need to let them inspect no matter what, before Mom gets to them!
We have been living together for ten years,
but this is the first time talking to you without the acting.
Come on, please be at ease.
You do not have to pretend to be good kids who do not know anything.
Right now, it is just the caretaker and the children meant to be food.
I love you as if you were my own children.
And that is why I am here.
I want you to give up.
Because I love you, I do not want you to suffer.
I do not want to have to make you all suffer.
It is a happy life, is not it?
A warm home filled with love and delicious food.
Without knowing hunger, coldness, or the truth, you can die with a satisfied feeling.
What part of that is unhappy?
Is the happiness you speak of similar to the end that Conny met?
Until that moment, Conny lived a rich life full of smiles.
I do not need any fake smiles!
Even if I suffer, I will live freely!
I will decide for myself what happiness is!
Let us all live together happily inside our home.
Until the end, when your time runs out.
I want the five of you to be happy.
I will quit being a good boy.
That is why I said to give up.
But you have not hugged me in a while, so that made me happy.
I will control you until the end.
That is how special you are.
A special meal that only a special One can eat.
The highest quality children that I have raised.
That is why I have to protect you.
I had to do this because you were not going to give up.
You cannot move for a while now.
I got a notice from the higher-ups.
Your shipment date has been set.
